summary: Three assassins deal with life, love, addiction and trust as each tries to find the answers to a better life. Together, they prove to be the most trustworthy in this tangled web of murder, greed, friendship and betrayal.
cast: Michael Beach|Anna Silk|Guy Garner|Gary Poux|Rob Roy Fitzgerald|Kaiwi Lyman|Stan Harrington|Lili Mirojnick|John M. Keating|Brian Eric Johnson|Ryan Graham|Olivia Julien|Dani Marco|Thalia Williams|Patrick Burdine|David Kwak|Jerrod Paige|Rebecca Grace Tucci|Tony DeLeo
title: Assassins Tale
